directives.title: Absolute File Creation Constraint
directives.rule: NEVER create files unless absolutely necessary for task completion
directives.context: Applies to all file creation operations during development sessions
directives.rationale: Prevents unnecessary file proliferation and maintains clean project structure

directives.title: Canonical File System Enforcement
directives.rule: NEVER create new files - use only canonical file structure
directives.context: All information must go to designated canonical files
directives.rationale: Prevents documentation sprawl and maintains organized structure

directives.title: TodoWrite Prohibition
directives.rule: PROHIBIT TodoWrite tool usage - exclusive task command authority
directives.context: All task management operations must use task command exclusively
directives.rationale: Prevents conflicts between multiple task management systems

universalMetrics.calculation: Count of all feature IDs in project

decisions.title: Persistent Knowledge Management Methodology
decisions.decision: Use CLAUDE.md as primary project state file with internal/ folder for detailed documentation
decisions.rationale: Complex projects span multiple AI conversations with context limits, requiring external knowledge management for continuity
decisions.tradeoffs: Additional file management overhead vs. maintained project context across sessions
